Sentencas: Focused ion beam (FIB) - scanning electron microscopy (SEM) serial sectioning tomography has become an important tool for three-dimensional microstructure reconstruction of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) to obtain an understanding of fabrication-related effects and SOFC performance.
Titulo: Optimization of Material Contrast for Efficient FIB-SEM Tomography of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: By sequential FIB milling and SEM imaging a stack of cross-section images across all functional SOFC layers was generated covering a large volume of 3.5 center dot 10(4)mu m(3).
Titulo: Optimization of Material Contrast for Efficient FIB-SEM Tomography of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: One crucial step is image segmentation where regions with different image intensities are assigned to different material phases within the SOFC.
Titulo: Optimization of Material Contrast for Efficient FIB-SEM Tomography of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: To analyze all relevant SOFC materials, it was up to now mandatory to acquire several images by scanning the same region with different imaging parameters because sufficient material contrast could otherwise not be achieved.
Titulo: Optimization of Material Contrast for Efficient FIB-SEM Tomography of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this work we obtained high-contast SEM images from a single scan to reconstract all functional SOFC layers consisting of a Ni/Y2O3-doped ZrO2(YDZ) cermet anode, YDZ electrolyte and (La,Sr)MnO3/YDZ cathode.
Titulo: Optimization of Material Contrast for Efficient FIB-SEM Tomography of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This was possible by using different, simultaneous read-out detectors installed in a state-of-the-art scanning electron microscope.
Titulo: Optimization of Material Contrast for Efficient FIB-SEM Tomography of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In addition, we used a deterministic approach for the optimization of imaging parameters by employing Monte Carlo simulations rather than trial-and-error tests.
Titulo: Optimization of Material Contrast for Efficient FIB-SEM Tomography of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We also studied the effect of detection geometry, detecting angle range and detector type.
Titulo: Optimization of Material Contrast for Efficient FIB-SEM Tomography of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
